short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open your browser to a smarter, safer and more beautiful Internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Andi browser extension turns your address bar into a smart AI search assistant that can answer anything, find everything, and write great content for you. Plus, search straight from the Andi search bar in the popup.

✅ Ask anything, get the right answers.

🔖 Summarize and explain content.

🖊️ Writes great content for you, with web research.

📚 Always accurate. Top Sources. Referenced.

🥰 Visual results and beautiful content.

⚔️ No ads. No spam. No tracking.

🆓 Free and Anonymous.

Andi uses AI everywhere to reimagine search. It's a better way to find and explore knowledge.
